snippet.title: Loopy Wizard: A broughlike where you control a wizard and cast deadly spells on monsters & yourself!
snippet.description:
Purchase on itch.io https://venbrux.itch.io/loopy-wizard?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Control a wizard and make wise use of spells. Can you outsmart the monsters and reach the end?
